user-home

Get the path to the user home directory

Install

sh $ npm install --save user-home

Usage

```js var userHome = require(‘user-home’);

console.log(userHome); //=> /Users/sindresorhus ```

CLI

sh $ npm install --global user-home

```sh $ user-home –help

Example $ user-home /Users/sindresorhus ```
